title: HPRCA Notification 2026 - Apply Online for 234 Junior Office Assistant Posts
description: The Himachal Pradesh Rajya Chayan Aayog (HPRCA) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 234 Junior Office Assistant Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed theirÂ 10th pass, ITI, 12th, and Diploma can apply for the HPRCA Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in online mode.
